column4: Hey guys and gals.  How do I remove wolfestiene enemy territory?  I try to delete  the file but it says I dont have the right permission
look for the directory where you installed it, tipically /usr/local/games/something
there should be an uninstall script
Yes, i know, i found it but when i try to deleat it, it wont deleat because It says i dont have the right permissions
